se.cbb.jprime.io

Class SampleWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.cbb.jprime.io.SampleWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sampler

    public class SampleWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Sampler
    Ordinary MCMC sampler for sampling to a character output stream. Can output to stdout or to a file. Buffers output, although the buffer is flushed continuously in the stdout case.

    The user may change the default delimiter (tab) with setDelim(...). Also, it is possible, e.g. by invoking setConcise("-"), to let the parts of a sample which has not changed from its previous state to be output as a dash: 

     (a,(b,c))      4       0.345
 -              3       0.213
 -              4       0.743
 ((a,b),c)      -       0.621
 ...
    This may reduce file size when there are discrete parameters concentrated on a small number of values (e.g. trees).
    Author:
    Joel Sj√∂strand.
